byline.contributor: Alan Blinder contributed reporting from Atlanta.

abstract: Spring breakers use social media to draw larger crowds to events and document behavior that then outrages residents who might not otherwise have noticed; Panama City Beach, Fla, no longer promotes itself as a spring break destination after videos of shooting and gang rape surfaced on social media.
lead_paragraph: Towns across the United States, like Keene, N.H., and Panama City Beach, Fla., that host big gatherings of young people that sometimes turn violent are instituting bans.

headline.main: Social Media Publicity Turns Wild Parties Into Trouble That Can’t Be Ignored
headline.print_headline: Social Media Publicity Turns Wild Parties Into Trouble That Can’t Be Ignored

snippet: Towns across the United States, like Keene, N.H., and Panama City Beach, Fla., that host big gatherings of young people that sometimes turn violent are instituting bans.
